FestoMPS3D

Class DoubleActingCylinder3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestoMPS3D.Unit3D
      • FestoMPS3D.Actuator3D
        • FestoMPS3D.DoubleActingCylinder3D

  • public class DoubleActingCylinder3D
extends Actuator3D
    Class creating a double acting cylinder consisting of :
    • a cube for body,
    • a cylinder for arm
    • and two cubes for front and back sensors.

    It provides three (3) extension points -one for the arm and two for the sensors- by means of branch groups with enabled the ALLOW_CHILDREN_READ, ALLOW_CHILDREN_WRITE, ALLOW_CHILDREN_EXTEND, ENABLE_PICK_REPORTING, ALLOW_DETACH capabilities.

    It support two behaviors by calling the animate() function.

    It supports extracting and retrieving the cylinder's arm.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoubleActingCylinder3D()
      Constructs a double acting cylinder with default configuration : body's dimensions = 1 x 1 x 2 cylinder's rad = biggest dimension/5 cylinder's length = 2 sensor's dimensions = 0.25 x 0.25 x 0.25 body's color = AppearanceAttributes.getBodyColor() arm's color = AppearanceAttributes.getSensorColor() sensor's color = AppearanceAttributes.getActuatorColor()

    • Constructor Detail

      • DoubleActingCylinder3D

        public DoubleActingCylinder3D()
        Constructs a double acting cylinder with default configuration :
        • body's dimensions = 1 x 1 x 2
        • cylinder's rad = biggest dimension/5
        • cylinder's length = 2
        • sensor's dimensions = 0.25 x 0.25 x 0.25
        • body's color = AppearanceAttributes.getBodyColor()
        • arm's color = AppearanceAttributes.getSensorColor()
        • sensor's color = AppearanceAttributes.getActuatorColor()
        See Also:
        AppearanceAttributes
